## LinearLayoutProperty class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export class LinearLayoutProperty
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [direction](./extractor.linearlayoutproperty.direction.md) |  | [LayoutDirection](./extractor.layoutdirection.md) | 排列方向，默认值为 right  { module:UILayout.LayoutDirection } |
|  [eulerOffset](./extractor.linearlayoutproperty.euleroffset.md) |  | [Vector3f](./extractor.vector3f.md) | 后一个物体相对于前一个物体的旋转偏移，默认值为 (0, 0, 0)  { module:Common.Vector3f } |
|  [eulerStart](./extractor.linearlayoutproperty.eulerstart.md) |  | [Vector3f](./extractor.vector3f.md) | 第一个物体的初始旋转，默认值为 (0, 0, 0)  { module:Common.Vector3f } |
|  [gap](./extractor.linearlayoutproperty.gap.md) |  | number | 相邻物体之间的间隔, 默认值为 0.2  { number } |
|  [layoutSize](./extractor.linearlayoutproperty.layoutsize.md) |  | [Vector3f](./extractor.vector3f.md) | 布局的大小，当各分量均不为0且物体的sizeBehavior不为holdSize时，会按照自身weight比例分配布局剩余空间,默认值为 (0, 0, 0)  { module:Common.Vector3f } |
